mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the incorrect use of the coordinate clause. She is a great singer, but she is also a great dancer.

options.a: She is a great singer, but she is also a great dancer.
options.b: I went to the store and bought some milk.
options.c: I love reading books, and I also love writing stories.
options.d: He is a good teacher, but his classes are boring sometimes.
